languages.text: "Кальдерон," {n}— регент неопределенно машет в сторону своих людей, —{/n} "с сего момента связан с вами новым контрактом от имени Дома Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Кальдерон," {n}- регент неопределенно машет в сторону своих людей, -{/n} "с сего момента связан с вами новым контрактом от имени Дома Орселлио".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Кальдерон," {n}— регент неопределенно машет в сторону своих людей, —{/n} "с сего момента связан с вами новым контрактом от имени Дома Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Calderon," {n}the regent vaguely gestures at his entourage, -{/n} "is now bound to you by the terms of a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Calderon," {n}the regent vaguely gestures at his entourage, -{/n} "is now bound to you by the terms of a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “卡尔德伦。”{n}摄政王朝他的随行人员含糊地做了个手势。{/n}“根据您与奥赛罗家族的新合约，从今以后，卡尔德伦将为您提供服务。”
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: “卡尔德伦。”{n}摄政王朝他的随行人员含糊地做了个手势。{/n}“根据您与奥塞罗家族的新合约，从今以后，卡尔德伦将为您提供服务。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Calderon», {n}dice el regente, gesticulando vagamente a su séquito.{/n} «Queda a su servicio por un nuevo contrato en nombre de la casa Orsellio».
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: «Calderon», {n}dice el regente, gesticulando vagamente a su séquito.{/n} «Queda a su servicio por un nuevo contrato en nombre de la casa Orsellio».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「カルデロンを」{n}摂政は側に控える者たちを身振りで示しながら言う。{/n}「この者が、オーセリオ家の代表として、新しい契約に基づいてあなたと結ばれる」
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: 「カルデロンを」{n}摂政は側に控える者たちを身振りで示しながら言う。{/n}「この者が、オーセリオ家の代表として、新しい契約に基づいてあなたと結ばれる」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Calderon", {n}sagt der Regent und gestikuliert vage in Richtung seines Gefolges,{/n} "untersteht Euch ab sofort mit einem neuen Vertrag im Namen des Hauses Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Calderon", {n}sagt der Regent und gestikuliert vage in Richtung seines Gefolges,{/n} "untersteht Euch ab sofort mit einem neuen Vertrag im Namen des Hauses Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « À partir de cet instant, Calderon est lié à vous par contrat au nom de la maison Orsellio, » {n}approuve le régent sans marquer la moindre hésitation tout en faisant un geste en direction de sa suite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: « À partir de cet instant, Calderon est lié à vous par contrat au nom de la maison Orsellio, » {n}approuve le régent sans marquer la moindre hésitation tout en faisant un geste en direction de sa suite.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Calderon." {n}Naip, maiyetindekilere doğru hafif bir el işareti yaparak sesleniyor.{/n} "Bundan böyle Orsellio Hanesi adına yeni bir kontratla size bağlı olacak."
languages.original_text: "Calderon," {n}says the regent, vaguely gesturing at his entourage,{/n} "is henceforth bound to you under a new contract on behalf of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Calderon." {n}Naip, maiyetindekilere doğru hafif bir el işareti yaparak sesleniyor.{/n} "Bundan böyle Orsellio Hanesi adına yeni bir kontratla size bağlı olacak kişi odur."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
